mapper.sql: wx_primary_key, settle_date, org_wx_primary_key, dms_related_key, org_dms_related_key, trans_id, trans_st, ins_code, mchnt_code, shop_code, sponsor, operator_open_id, resp_code, pri_acct_no, card_no, user_inf_user_name, product_code, trans_amt, upload_amt, trans_curr_cd, trans_chnl, trans_fee, trans_fee_type, tfr_in_acct_no, tfr_out_acct_no, additional_info, remarks, create_user, update_user, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_WX_TRANS_LOG${tableNum} () VALUES (#{wxPrimaryKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{settleDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgWxPrimaryKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dmsRelatedKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgDmsRelatedKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transSt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{insCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mchntCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shopCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sponsor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatorOpenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{respCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{priAcctNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userInfUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transAmt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uploadAmt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transCurrCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transChnl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transFee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transFeeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tfrInAcctNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tfrOutAccNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{additionalInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '99999999', '99999999', SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
mapper.update:
UPDATE TB_WX_TRANS_LOG${tableNum} SET trans_st = #{transSt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, resp_code = #{respCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, trans_amt = #{transAmt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dms_related_key = #{dmsRelatedKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
org_dms_related_key = #{orgDmsRelatedKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
trans_fee=#{transFee,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = SYSDATE WHERE wx_primary_key = #{wxPrimaryKey}
